title: Enhancing Healthcare Practice Competencies: Short-Term Course for Strengthening Instructional Design Capabilities through Reflective Practice

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic educational terminology and core learning design concepts
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can write and share reflective journals on instructional design decisions at least three times using the RAID framework.
Learners can analyze the effectiveness of learning objects using four or more evaluation criteria with the LORI tool.
Learners can improve learning material prototypes by incorporating peer feedback at least twice in blended learning environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
